name: Will Repair!
description:
Will Smith is dying and you have to save him! 

You are a nanobot inside Will's body, there you will have to repair the different damages that his body has to keep him alive... But, careful! the road will not be easy and you will find obstacles that will stop you in this race against the clock.

Game developed for the global game jam 2020 with unity. This game was developed in 48h.

Programmers:

  • Alba Fontaneda Rueda
  • Alex Quesada López
  • Antonio Muñoz Gallego
  • Katia Galera Fernández
  • Pablo Castejón Navarro

Art/Desing:

  • Carlos Peralta Sorolla
  • Humberto Parisi Campo

Contributors:

  •  Irene Camps Ortueta

Music:

 Milo Giraldo
